name: the winds in you
description:
this game was originally made for the Devs With Baltimore bundle. please, support marginalized voices & take a stand against police brutality. black lives matter.

<|>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<|>

i wrote these poems over the last semester. i'd like you to have them.

this is a very small first-person exploration game. use the mouse, wasd, and the spacebar to play. please enjoy, and let me know if you want more!

above all, be well.

note: though the bundle is over, you can still support the cause (and please do). proceeds from this page will support my game creation, NOT go to the Baltimore Algebra Project.

more games at http://sundaemonth.com/
this game has no audio. maybe i will update it in the future?

<|>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<|>

//there are islands in the sun//

//there are diamonds in the water//
